DOC.brief_summary: Meconium aspiration syndrome ( MAS ) important cause severe respiratory failure newborn infant . Treatment MAS mainly supportive surfactant therapy might change course disease . Aim study evaluate whether lung lavage dilute bolus poractant alfa change duration mechanical respiratory support outcomes MAS .
DOC.brief_title: Lung Lavage With Dilute Poractant Alfa Meconium Aspiration Syndrome
DOC.criteria: Infants gestational age ≥ 36 week , birth weight ≥ 2.0 kg , evidence passage meconium delivery , typical chest radiology finding mechanically ventilate infant mean airway pressure ≥ 12 cm H2O enrol . Congenital cardiac anomaly Major congenital anomaly Hemodynamically unstable infant
